intro: Echinocystis australis, commonly known as the Australian hedge gynehia, is a climbing vine native to Australia. It belongs to the family Cucurbitaceae, which includes plants like cucumbers and pumpkins. The plant produces yellow flowers that give way to green, spiny fruits resembling small gourds. Its leaves are heart-shaped and often have a rough texture. Echinocystis australis is adapted to arid environments and is often found in shrublands and along fences.
